hangman

Class LoadData

  • java.lang.Object
    • hangman.LoadData

  • public class LoadData
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that loads all the possible words onto a variable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoadData() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String loadWords()
      Loads all the words of the file 'dictionaryy.txt' that have the same length of letters as the word the user is thinking of, into a variable.
      static void makeNewDictionary()
      This method is only to make a new dictionary since the website from where i took the word gave me words with spaces meh, it's not used in the program.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoadData

        public LoadData()

    • Method Detail

      • loadWords

        public static java.lang.String loadWords()
        Loads all the words of the file 'dictionaryy.txt' that have the same length of letters as the word the user is thinking of, into a variable.
        Returns:
        Returns all the words of the same length.
        Returns null case there are no words of that length.

      • makeNewDictionary

        public static void makeNewDictionary()
                              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                     java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method is only to make a new dictionary since the website from where i took the word gave me words with spaces meh, it's not used in the program.
        Isto serve só para fazer outro dicionário sem palavras com espaços visto que o website de onde eu copiei as palavras me deu, palavras com 20 espaços... lel
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - ....it's kinda obvious
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Caso o ficheiro não esteja no formato

        "UTF-8"
